name: Flamingo
interestingFact: The color pink comes from beta-carotene in the crustaceans and plankton that flamingos eat

name: Toucan
interestingFact: Toucan have the longest bill of any bird in the world in relation to their body size

name: Kingfisher
interestingFact: Kingfisher are most famous for hunting and eating fish but they also eat insects,spiders etc,

name: Macaw
interestingFact: Macaws are the largest type of parrot and could live 60-80 years

name: Parrot
interestingFact: Parrots are known for imitating human voices.

name: Bearded Reedling
interestingFact: They eat insects in the summer, but feed on seeds in the autumn

name: Penguin
interestingFact: Penguins are flightless birds and use their wings(flippers) to help them swim in the water.
